title: Scariest ability in League of Legends?
body: Let me ask you guys something, what is (in your opinion) the most scariest ability a champion could possibly have? For me it's {{champion:75}} W (Wither) and/or {{champion:23}}  W (Mocking Shout) because they both act very similar. Now you might be asking me why only slowing abilities? Why not something like {{champion:13}} W (Rune Prison) where it actually stops you from doing anything, and to that I'll ask you again: What is the SCARIEST ability a champion could have? Not, what is the most bullshit ability a champion could have (cause this post isn't a rant). Still don't get it? Imagine running from one of these two and they slow you (and if you're well aware these slows are BIG), as you try to run away they come closer and closer and when they finally get in range... BAM! Your health is gone. Through that whole process you do your very best trying to kite as much as possible only for it to be nothing as they 100-0 you and your mind breaks slowly. At least with {{champion:13}} you're mentally prepared you are going to die, but with these two? They are basically toying with your emotions and it's just dirty and wrong. So again, what ability/abilities do you guys find terrifying?

replies.body: One that always gets me is Nocturne ult =D "DARRRKKNNEESSSSS"
Second this. Especially if your already involved in a skirmish with your lane oppenent

I agree

Those 4 seconds cant end quick enough
Yeah definitely because you have no idea if you're the target or not

and if you aren't in a premade with voice comms, the sheer disruption nocturne's ult causes in teamfights and coordinated skirmishes can ruin you even if he didn't even use the ult to make a pick.

My most disliked ability is probably veigar's ult (even though I play this little ball of hate myself) because the basic 1click almost unavoidable unoutplayable obliteration threat it poses to any less than 80% squishy and any less than 30% tank is terrifying.
Blitz Q's from fog scare me the most as im normally just clearing a wave or whatever and suddenly im knocked up surrounded by the enemy team.
The  banana or death as it flies out of FOW to take your life, ezreal Ult.
i love watching my banana's get the last hit during laning phase, reasons why i play league

Good question! :P 
For me, it'd probably be **Yasuo's 3rd Q**, it hits you, and in that split-second while you're airborne, your mind is frantically calculating how many seconds its been since he last used his ult, and you're thinking: 
_"Will i land back on my two feet and walk away... or will a flying swordsman just appear over my frail body and cut off any hope of escape?"_

Its only in a brief moment that all this flashes through your head, but it feels like forever.. 
THE SUSPENSE D:

Other scary abilities for me would be:
**Shaco's Q:**  You 'think' you see a puff of red smoke, juuuuust outside a bush... and suddenly all the empty space around you feels 'malicious'.
**Aurelion Sol's Q:** Ive never been on the receiving end of this, but i can imagine that seeing a galaxy twice the size of the lane come hurtling towards you, must inspire some level of both fear and awe.

I think the scariest ability for me has to be Shaco's W (Jack in the Box)

Usually you would find yourself running away from that Shaco and poof a box appears and you're feared back into him. 
Mentally prepared to escape, feeling like you've just found some hope and **bam**, uncontrollable face crit from the jester.

That or I'm with Maraudaur, Nocturne's Ultimate.
I still get a fright from Rengar ult, since the theme that plays when he is near is just so scary
malphite ulty from fog of war ap or tank, doesn't matter
Thats a real heart-attack moment that one!

The scariest thing i find is mostly just anything with an Attack Speed slow, because it becomes so hard to then determine what damage output you have on a crap load of champions, and just causes me to have a lot of problems with champions like Malphite and fiora as they have them and make fighting them a crap load harder.

Vayne's Silver Bolts.

But victims of my Rengar seem to say Rengar's R.
